events.name: Think Your Student Can Pass an AI Literacy Test? A Concerning New Study Says Otherwise
events.description: A new study reveals a troubling gap in AI literacy, showing most students can’t effectively use or evaluate generative AI tools.

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Sava, Hrvatska - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the mysterious past of Sava, a town in Croatia where a concerning new study suggests that students may struggle to pass an AI literacy test. Visit the local museum and learn about the town's history, including its connection to the infamous 'Sava Incident' of 1952.
